Key Match Events: Adem Bona played a little over 17 minutes, pulling down nine rebounds which tied for the team high, scored four points on put-back layups, blocked a shot, and was a -4 in the eight-point loss.
Pre-Game Insights: Joel Embiid managing his knee in the second night of a back-to-back and Andre Drummond coming down with an illness hours before the game forced Nick Nurse to give Adem Bona a crack at some center minutes.
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Nurse thought Adem Bona was lively and didn't really make many mistakes, giving him credit for being prepared to go out there at any given moment.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Adem Bona credited his G League game reps for helping him be ready for his opportunity on Wednesday, and he feels like what's helped him progress the most since training camp has just been practicing with Embiid and Drummond.
Others: Adem Bona has developed a close relationship with fellow rookie Jared McCain, and they bond over their faith, with the two going to chapel together before every game.
